pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Spatial Segregation // Measuring spatial segregation. The methods implemented in this package include White's P index (1983) doi:10.1086/227768, Morrill's D(adj) (1991), Wong's D(w) and D(s) (1993) doi:10.1080/00420989320080551, and Reardon and O'Sullivan's set of spatial segregation measures (2004) doi:10.1111/j.0081-1750.2004.00150.x.
